translated: Myreberg, Knut Ivan, minister, Ödeborg, b. March 17, 1911 in Frykerud, Värmland. 1st marriage in 1939 to Margit Jansson. Children: Bnita b. 1941, Agneta b. 1945. Education: graduated from private elementary school in Lund in 1934, theology degree in Gothenburg in 1936, theological candidacy and practical theology exam in Lund in 1939, ordained as a priest for the Karlistad diocese the same year. Serving as a curate in Bro in 1940, in Fålipstad in 1941, in Nyskoga in 1942, and in Trankil from 1942-1944. Became a vicar in Ödeborg from 1944. Chairman of the school board and church council in Trankiis from 1942-1944, and of the local child welfare board in Ödeborg from 1946 onwards.
